column1: skywalkerfan52,"2020-09-06T02:45:58.36Z","Review: LEGO Pick a Model Ollie rollercoster","<ul>

column2: Set 3850070-1 is the LEGO Oille roller-coaster that is a Pick a Model at LEGOLAND Florida that is recommended for ages 6+ And has 58 pieces.

This set is very smooth and clean. It includes all the details of Oille and he even has a nice smile. There are 2 sets of small wheels on the bottom so it won't fit on the LEGO roller-coaster track which is kind of sad for me. The roller-coaster  is supposed to be minfig scale but I feel like it's a little bigger then minfig scale. This set came out in 2017 and it cost 7.99 on the LEGOLAND Florida shop website.
Thank you for reading my review because this is actually my first review on Brickset :)
Some photos from the legoland Florida website ??
